theDuelist:Gate.NAME: Gate
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of turn, deal #b
damage to ALL enemies, gain #b
block, and gain #b1 #yEnergy. NL #yEvoke: #ySummon #b
. NL Gate is unaffected by #yFocus.

theDuelist:Buffer.NAME: Buffer
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of turn, increase #b
random #ybuff stacks by #b1. NL #yEvoke: Gain a random #ybuff that lasts for #b
turns.

theDuelist:MonsterOrb.NAME: MonsterOrb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of turn, add #b
random monster to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Add #b
random monsters to your hand.

theDuelist:DragonOrb.NAME: DragonOrb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of turn, add #b
random #yDragon to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Change the cost of #b
random #yDragons in your hand to #b0.

theDuelist:DragonPlusOrb.NAME: DragonOrb+
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of turn, add #b
random upgraded #yDragon to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Change the cost of #b
random #yDragons in your hand to #b0.

theDuelist:ReducerOrb.NAME: Reducer
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of turn, increase the number of cards reduced when evoked by #b
. NL #yEvoke: Change the cost of #b
random cards in your hand to 0.

theDuelist:Summoner.NAME: Summoner
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn, #ySummon #b
. NL #yEvoke: #yIncrement #b
